welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kannapolis, a charming city known for its small-town feel and friendly residents. We invite you to explore our beautiful parks, delicious local cuisine, and vibrant downtown area. Enjoy your stay and soak in the best of what Kannapolis has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Concord-Padgett Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Concord-Padgett Regional Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rowan County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Rowan County Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse E
terminals.description: Concourse E at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves all international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Statesville Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
